item.title: TryHackMe - Attacktive Directory
item.description: Enumeration Basic enumeration starts out with an nmap scan. Nmap is a relatively complex utility that has been refined over the years to detect what ports are open on a device, what services are running, and even detect what operating system is running. It’s important to note that not all services may be deteted correctly and not enumerated to it’s fullest potential. Despite nmap being an overly complex utility, it cannot enumerate everything.
